name: Effective date
text:
ARTICLE 10.
EFFECTIVE DATE AND REPEALER

 §490:10-101    This chapter shall take effect on January 1, 1967.  It applies to transactions entered into and events occurring on or after that date. [L 1965, c 208, §10-101; HRS §490:10-101]
COMMENTS TO OFFICIAL TEXT
  This effective date is suggested so that there may be ample time for all those who will be affected by the provisions of the Code to become familiar with them.
